description: This warming, lemony chicken soup recipe is perfect for those cooler nights when you're craving something comforting and cosy.
name: GreekStyle Lemon & Chicken Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return broth to a gentle simmer over low heat. Add shredded chicken and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Remove pan from heat. Gradually add egg mixture, stirring constantly, until broth becomes glossy. Season. Divide soup among bowls. Serve scattered with dill leaves, remaining zest and a drizzle of oil.
